cards.header: Ni gute urubuga canke ayandi matororokanirizo y'amkuru ashobora gushikira abantu benshi bashoboka cane cane mu gihe ari amakuru ahambaye?

cards.text:
![ibimenyeshamakuru Social bitororokanijwe](2;png)  
##Muri iki cigwa uzobona:  
• ivyo abamenyeshamakuru baraba ku bimenyeshamakuru social.  
• ingene umuntu ashobora gukoresha ibimenyeshamakuru social mu gutanga inkuru.  
• ingene umuntu amenya ikinyamakuru aza gukoresha.  
• uburyo ushobora gukoresha kugira inkuru yawe imenyekane.

Urubuga rwo kumenyesha amakuru rurashobora gushikira abantu benshi cane.Muri Asia y'ubuseruko nahandi mu nmyaka iheze, inkuru zitandukanye kuri Twitter Facebook na Youtube zishikaho imbere yo gushika ku mboneshakure nka BBC,CNN cane Aljazeera.Iyo inkuru iciye ku mboneshakure hamwe no ku rubuga birashobora gutera ikibazo leta canke ayandi mashirahamwe akomeye kwishura ivyiyo nkuru.

![Ibimenyeshamakuru Social bitororokanijwe](3.png)  
Amashirahamwe avuga amakuru aratorokanya ibinyamakuru ashobora gukoresha mu gutanga inkuru. Aba akeneye kwegeranya inkuru zitororokanijwe neza kandi zitohojwe. Abamenyeshamakuru ba banyagihugu bazi ico ayo mashirahamwe arondera- hamwe nimyitwarariko yayo-barashobora guca bagira imigenderanire hmwe n'ukuronka akaryo ko inkuru zabo ziboneka cane gutyo zikaba arizo zituma ingingo zifatwa haba mu gihugu canke hanze y'igihugu.

Ku mashirahamwe menshi, ukumenyekana hamwe n'uburyo bwiza bwo kwegeranya amakuru no kuyatorokanya nivyo bituma ashobora gutora ibikoresho vyokoreshwa n'umumenyeshamakuru w'umunyagihugu.Munsi hari ibintu bikurikizwa mu gutora ivyo bikoresho, tuzobibona mu bice bikurikira.

## Ibigufasha:  
&bull: ntagura kubaka urutonde rw’ingene ukoresha Internet nk’umumenyeshamakuru uciye kubikuranga biri ku ma site ya réseaux sociaux. MENYA: umutekano urashobora kuba ikibazo. Wibuke gukoresha izina ritari rwawe sico kimwe no kudakoresha izina.(Wihweze ivyerekeye umutekano)  
• umeneye ivyo uriko urakorerako.Hanyuma ube umuhinga.Ibi bizogufasha mu gutanga akazi kameze neza kandi ugume uri imbere.  
•ugerageze kutagira aho uhengamiye naho inkuru yoba ibabaje cane canke iryoshe gose.  
•muriko muravugana n'abandi bamenyeshamakuru urabereka ubuhinga wakoresheje hamwe n'ingorane ubwo buhinga bushobora gutera ingorane n'izindi nkuru.  
•inkuru utanga urashobora guca uvuga niyo wayikuye mu gihe bishoboka kugira bishoboke kuyirondera. (Vyinshi kuvyerekeye gutanga inkuru muri iki gice)  
•amajambo mato mato ari nk'amajambo y'umutwe arahambaye gose haba mu masanamu canke mu mareresi. Kurondera ukoresheje internet ntibizokoroha kirestse umuntu azi inkuru yawe gose agaca akoresha amajambo ashobora kumutuma kuyironka.Ikindi ni uko umumenyeshamakuru atoye inkuru yawe amajambo azoba ariko niyo azomufasha kumva inkuru yawe. (Vyinshi kuvyerekeye gutororokanya inkuru)  
&bullUgerageze kumva inkuru uriko urakorerako n'uburyo yoshobora gushikira abantu benshi.Inkuru nyisnhi zirafise uburyo zitangwamwo.Akarorero ni ako inkuru yerekeye igisasu giturika-iyo nkuru irafise uburyo itangwamwo n'ibiyivugwamwo- bitandukanye n'inkuru y'umurwanyi yakomeretse ariko aravuga ivyerekeye amatora.Vyongeye amashirahamwe akomeye aratororkanya inkuru nyinshi zitandukanye kugira zironke inkuru nyinshi.Ni ugutahura ukuntu inkuru yawe izokwizwa mu ruhande runini. (Vyinshi muri iki gice ku bijanye n'inkuru).  
&bull Ntuvuge ibintu utazi canke udashobora gutohoza.Inkuru itohojwe naho yoba ari ntoya irashika kure gusumba inkuru ijanye n'ibihe.  
&bull Ni vyiza kuba mu murwi kugira muvugane ibijanye n'inkuru zitangwa mugacimbiri murimwo.

![Akarorero k'inkuru ir kuri twitter](4.jpg)  
Mu gacimbiri kose inkuru irashobora gutangurwa n'isanamu canke ubutumwa bugufi igaca iba inkuru nini.Uko uzomenya vyinshi niko uzoshobora no gushikira abatari bake ,kandi ugashobora no gukoresha ibinyamakuru bitandukanye,ugomba kugerageza guhitamwo ibikoresho vyiza vyo kuvuga inkuru yawe.Kuri bamwe bamwe amareresi niyo meza, ku bandi amajwi niyo meza.

Itarambere ry'inkuru yawe riratandukanye n'urubuga uba wakoresheje,ivyo vyitwa iterambere ry'inkuru.Birahambaye gutegera uburyo abandi bamenyeshamakuru bakoresha amashirahamwe hamwe n'urubuga mw'iterambere ry'inkuru.Mu gihe ukora mu mugambi canke mw'ishirahamwe rinini birakenewe ko wumva uburyo wokoresha mu kumenyesha inkuru.

##Wibuke  
&bull Urubuga rwa internet rurakora cane ku nkuru nshasha.Ico ni ukugikorerako.  
&bullUkumenyekana kwawe nk'umumenyeshamakuru mu gacimbiri kawe birhambaye gose ku mashirahamwe mashasha.  
&bull uko inkuru itera imbere niko n'inkuru yategerezwa gushikira abatari bake.  
• utahure ko inkuru ishikira benshi niko n'ishirahamwe ryawe rigenda riramenyekana.

cards.question: Ni ikihe muri ibi ari ingingo shingiro ku mumenyeshamakuru? (Inyishu zishobora kuba nyinshi)

choices.text: Ukwishira ku rubuga rwa internet rumenyesha amakuru.
Ivyo woba wakoresheje vyose,gikorwa cawe gitegerezwa kwama gikoresha ubuhinga budasanzwe.
Umugambi wawe utegerezwa kuba uri ku bintu bikuryohera hanyuma ukawerekana wishimikije ivyiyumviro vyawe n'izindi nkuru wakuye ahandi,

cards.question: Nivyo canke sivyo:Ibintu bibiri vyerekana umumenyeshamakuru w'umwenegihugu ni uko kenshi amera nk'uwuyaga n'abantu, hanyuma umumenyeshamakuru akerekana ivyo yakoresheje mu gutororokanya inkuru yiwe,n'ibimutuma ayikora uko.

choices.text: Ukurondera canke ukutarondera imber yo gukora ikintu.
Uburyo bwo gushikira ibiharuro canke ibindi mu gitito.
Ukudashobora gushikira abantu benshi haba mu gihugu canke hanze yaco.
